name: fig patchwork zip purse
description:
Pale taupe linen is leaf printed with an bold fig leaf and combined with solid brown linen and dotted vintage cotton on the front of this zippered purse. The back is solid brown and the purse is lined in natural linen.

Size: 8.25" x 4.75"

Colors: Brown, natural, taupe

Care: Hand wash in warm water using mild detergent. Drip dry. Iron while still damp. Do not dry clean or tumble.

name: fern zip purse
description:
Delicate fern fronds are leaf printed on the front of this zippered natural linen purse, which is lined with vintage cotton fabric.

Size: 8.25" x 4.75"

Colors: Natural linen with brown print, multicolored lining

Care: Hand wash in warm water using mild detergent. Drip dry. Iron while still damp. Do not dry clean or tumble.

name: green mod bloom pillow
description:
This pillow is made from a screen printed loosely woven linen fabric from the 60's. It is backed by reclaimed wool and is finished with an invisible zipper. This pillow comes with your choice of an artisan made, hand stuffed pillow inserts of either 25% down/75% feather or 100% organic wool. 2 in stock.

Size: 18" x 18"

Colors: olive green and off-white, with olive green back.

Care: Spot clean or dry clean only.

name: tupelo eco printed envelope clutch
description:
Black tupelo leaves are eco printed on the outer linen fabric for this elegant envelope clutch. The clutch is reinforced with interfacing, and lined with cotton. It closes with a braided linen cord and a vintage button.

Eco printing is a natural printing method where the leaves and other materials are positioned on the fabric, rolled up or clamped tightly, and processed in simmering water. The impressions left on the fabric are from the pigments released by the leaf. 

Size: 6" x 9.5" x 0.5"

Colors: offwhite linen, gold, brown, gray, and tan print, light gray lining.

Care: spot clean only.

name: oatmeal fig towel
description:
A bold fig leaf is hand printed on the front of this linen towel, which has roll folded hems and a corner loop for hanging.

The screen used for this print was created from an actual leaf print. The print was scanned and the resulting image was then used to burn the silk screen. The screen paint is water based and non-toxic, and the printed fabric is heat set to ensure color fastness. 

Size: 18" x 24"

Colors: oatmeal linen with dark brown print

Care: Hand wash in warm water, or machine wash on gentle cycle, using mild detergent. Drip dry. Iron while still damp. Do not dry clean or tumble.
